tool_description: CheapShark is a price comparison website for digital PC Games, providing pricing data across multiple stores.
title: CheapShark API

api_list.name: edit_alert
api_list.description: Set or delete a price alert for a specific game and price.

required_parameters.name: action
required_parameters.description: The action to take on the price alert ('set' or 'delete').

optional_parameters.name: game_id
optional_parameters.description: An existing gameID, required for 'set' and 'delete'.

optional_parameters.name: price
optional_parameters.description: The price to wait for, only required when using 'set' value for action parameter.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'https://www.cheapshark.com/api/1.0/alerts'
params = {'action': action, 'email': email, 'gameID': game_id, 'price': price}
response = requests.get(url, params=params)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: manage_alerts
api_list.description: Send an email containing a link to manage your alerts.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: Any valid email address with existing alerts.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'https://www.cheapshark.com/api/1.0/alerts'
params = {'action': 'manage', 'email': email}
response = requests.get(url, params=params)
print(response.json())
